duties_responsibilities.duty: Validating and processing Investment Bank, Private Bank, and Commercial Bank Loan Fees including origination, amendment, syndication, and ticking fees.
Reviewing loan origination and fee documents to make fee booking decisions in accordance with internal accounting policy.
Calculation and preparation of syndication fees on fully syndicated deals and complex fee write-ups for Financial Controllers.
Preparing fee templates for Deal Closers and monitoring and balancing fees held awaiting disposition.
Mitigating risk event possibilities, tracking outstanding fee balances, and accounting for prior month adjustments in SAP.
Facilitating metric reports and conference calls related to fees paid and processing status.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or Mathematics (preferred)
